message:
Census spies will track every home: Anger at 'intrusion of vast computer network'

"Every home will be monitored by state ‘tracking computers’ to check if people return their census forms, it has been revealed. The surveillance network will try to ensure more than 22million households fill in the 32-page forms... But the checks... provoked protests about intrusion yesterday."

http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-1359205/Census-spies-track-home-Anger-intrusion-vast-network.html
